DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate clinical performance ProceraÂ® Bridge Zirconia veneer NobelRondo Zirconia .
DOC.detailed_description: The study design open , 5-year , prospective , multi-center clinical post-market study . The objective clinical study industrial centrally produce 3- 4-unit bridge yttrium-oxide partially-stabilized ( Y-TZP ) zirconia ( Procera Zirconia ) combination veneer ceramic material NobelRondo show sufficient CDA rating ( 90 % R+S ) sufficient survival rate 1 5 year .
